tool_description: API that shows the latest news regarding cryptocurrency in Canada.
name: Crypto Canada Live
title: Crypto Canada Live

api_list.name: Get individual source of News
api_list.description: Get News about cryptocurrency from a single specified source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-canada-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/cbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-canada-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-canada-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-canada-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Canadian Crypto news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about cryptocurrency in Canadian journals.
